contexts.context: A <mark>large</mark> question mark in the center of the paper.—#...
...articles, with one containing a drawing of a <mark>large</mark> woman and a small man with some text underneath...
...1909. Wednesday In case a woman is so <mark>large</mark> around the waist That her husband can't hug her...
...time going round. I hope I won't be <mark>large</mark> again Care of the Hands in Winter Floreance....
